name: Coast And Jungle Adventure Tour
description:
The Coast and Jungle Adventure Tour takes you along the beautiful coast of the Bay of Banderas, through a lush off-road jungle trail and to an authentic Mexican fishing village, making this one of our most popular tours and a day you won’t soon forget……

On the way to the coast, Ride along the scenic Malecon by the shore through old colonial Vallarta, you’ll get a glimpse of the city’s famous contemporary bronze sculptures and witness its vibrant culture.
